extendedInfo.description: Let people know where you are! This application can send SMS or email with your coordinates and link to Google Maps. This link also opens in Maps application on Android and iPhone, and can be used as an endpoint for driving directions. Old version is also available.2.01: Remove contact button.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Works really well. I do cross country paragliding, and this is really useful when I land out in some random place, to let friends know where I am to come and get me. Thanks!
reviews.author: Richard Darling

reviews.title: Looks nice...
reviews.comment: App looks nice. Simple and uncluttered. Unfortunately cannot add quick contacts. When I press quick contact button I get a selection of 9 contacts, most are email addresses. Samsung Captivate, 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s an interesting concept. It seems to work fairly well. However adding contacts does not work. I just get a bunch of 3 digit numbers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a classy app. Great for giving quick, accurate directions to someone you\'re meeting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Do like bought no add. Ver lots potential if fix remove contact ability & reduce error. Still like the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Used this app multiple times and every time it was the wrong location...disappointed...I would give zero stars but can\'t so one it is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great and is what I was looking for. Would like to be able to change default message.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5++ stars perfectly simple to use! Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would get better score if it would enable GPS automatically.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs error correction
reviews.comment: the program works good but it needs an error correction override. As testing from the front of my house it locates me 2 houses down (poor gps accuracy) so i would then be sending the wrong location.  If there was a map where you could move it to your actual location, it would be great for when you need a pretty direct hit. also a nice feature to have would to be able to type an address or gps location or by moving to it on the map and selecting the location as say a meeting point or where an event is going to be held so you dont actually need to be there to send it to everyone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Not only can it show me where exactly I am at the moment, I can show others via text or E-mail if I don\'t have the address. 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wish you\'re able to SMS & get phone\'s location remotely like on GPS Tracker so can see where at or just phone\'s location!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good for when you need to know where your gf/bf is. Awesome app better than latitude. Mytouch slide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, really love it, but only tree stars, because of contacts issue on HTC Desire. Is showing only some numbers instead of contacts names :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Here I am
reviews.comment: Gr8 nw we jst need 2 kp up wth d awesum wrk guys

reviews.comment: Very cool I got the ad free version

reviews.title: Keith
reviews.comment: Says accurate to 37 meters but says i am about 6 miles from where i really am. Lol

reviews.comment: Cool app, i like it

reviews.comment: You are an idiot if you complain about advertisement. would you prefer to pay for the application or get it for free?

reviews.comment: Omg. Are you f.in kidding me. This shouldnt be so hard- the UI is impossible and needs GPS. Please, please just simple directions. No useless flash.
